${ModID}:MissileStrike.NAME: Missile Strike
${ModID}:MissileStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:MagicDart.NAME: Magic Dart
${ModID}:MagicDart.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your hand size.
${ModID}:MagicDart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL Deal damage equal to your hand size.

${ModID}:Cull.NAME: Cull
${ModID}:Cull.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL EVERYONE loses !M! 生命.

${ModID}:Potential.NAME: Potential
${ModID}:Potential.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_生命. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Potential.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_生命. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Aura.NAME: Aura
${ModID}:Aura.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose 生命.

${ModID}:MAXPOWER.NAME: MAX POWER
${ModID}:MAXPOWER.DESCRIPTION: Raise your 力量 NL to 11.

${ModID}:Flow.NAME: Flow
${ModID}:Flow.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If the last card played 本回合 was an Attack, 抽 !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:Manaburst.NAME: Manaburst
${ModID}:Manaburst.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add a random 0-cost Attack from your 弃牌堆 to your hand.
${ModID}:Manaburst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add !M! random 0-cost Attacks from your 弃牌堆 to your hand.

${ModID}:IchorGoblet.NAME: Ichor Goblet
${ModID}:IchorGoblet.DESCRIPTION: 获得 [E] at the start of next !M! turns. If you lose 生命, 获得 it all immediately.
